scenario.title: Healthy Senior - Clear Response
scenario.user_response: Yes, I just took my blood pressure medication. Thank you for reminding me.
scenario.expected_outcome: No confusion, low risk, no alert needed
scenario.user_profile: Healthy senior with good cognitive function

scenario.title: Early Dementia - Mild Confusion
scenario.user_response: Um... the pills? I think I took them... or was that yesterday? The white ones, right?
scenario.expected_outcome: Mild confusion detected, moderate risk, consider gentle follow-up
scenario.user_profile: Early-stage dementia, usually manages well with reminders
